“Genocide is a process. The Holocaust did not start with the gas chambers. It started with hate speech.”
-- @UN_GP_RtoP's Adama Dieng on how to #PreventGenocide ⬇️ https://t.co/a9FEPbwfIE

Welcome to the UN family, actress, author & entrepreneur Kate Hudson - now @WFP Goodwill Ambassador! Thank you for lending your voice to the 821 million people who go to bed hungry every night. https://t.co/milOdNYMTp #ZeroHunger https://t.co/sRtxiF0Vqe

An UN Peacekeeper from Indonesia talked to students in south Lebanon about her work #ServingForPeace with @UNIFIL_. Find out more about @UNPeacekeeping here: https://t.co/fDUoYEbIS0 https://t.co/DygZ33eV21
Racism, homophobia, religious intolerance - the #GlobalGoals aim to reduce all forms of discrimination and inequality. Here’s how you can help: https://t.co/vtbxXCjn7i https://t.co/I61APsoHct
.@ilo set labour standards that limit work hours to maximum 48 a week plus adequate rest periods - like the weekend! https://t.co/9rO0biZNnK #ILO100 https://t.co/or8CkJDw1K

"We all have a right to breathe clean air!"

Ahead of Sunday's NYC marathon, @UNEnvironment Ambassador for Clean Air @paulajradcliffe joins the fight to #BeatAirPollution. https://t.co/CuCxPZu0s4 #BreatheLife https://t.co/NXVOMuh1Of

"We must do all we can now to end human suffering and avoid the worst humanitarian crisis in the world from getting even worse." -- @antonioguterres calling for urgent action to prevent an imminent catastrophe in Yemen. https://t.co/2NJnTnithF https://t.co/CEnnmHPBoJ

Taking #ClimateAction and ensuring people are healthy & prosperous go hand in hand. There is nothing to lose and everything to gain from protecting our planet! https://t.co/K0aDMQXinD https://t.co/mIjNLd8to7

1000+ journalists were killed in the last 12 years for reporting the news & informing the public. 

Friday's Int'l Day to #EndImpunity for Crimes against Journalists calls for greater accountability & justice. https://t.co/myMjnuYstt https://t.co/eIkbfpIM7T

.@AminaJMohammed opened a powerful photo exhibit at @followBDC in collaboration with @UNPeacekeeping which showcases the Liberian people's triumph over war. Details: https://t.co/CNW8kLvfSx #ServingForPeace https://t.co/Hynf5xKdCQ

"Reporting is not a crime. Together, let's stand up for journalists, for truth and for justice." -- @antonioguterres on Friday's Intl Day to #EndImpunity for Crimes against Journalists. https://t.co/yPxQ0t5TML #TruthNeverDies https://t.co/pR5e4cAdW4
Through a new @UNDP_Pacific initiative you can now adopt your very own shark - and help conserve reef & marine life. https://t.co/3MfihZOBiu  #GlobalGoals via @UNDP https://t.co/Oj7eMJqKXu

Killing a journalist does not kill the truth. 

Send a message of hope. Support @UNESCO's #TruthNeverDies campaign. https://t.co/lIhPqGDigl https://t.co/As7TJoXUR4

.@UNHumanRights #FightRacism expert urges countries to implement anti-hate speech laws to counter hatred & intolerance fueled online by Neo-Nazis & nationalist populists: https://t.co/dN073fShcx https://t.co/LPiJsjgYkZ
Support gender equality & women's empowerment around the world. @UN_Women has ideas how: https://t.co/hXdPIZpvAc  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/T6s4RffXX4

"Contributing to @UNPeacekeeping is a concrete demonstration of global solidarity & responsibility." -- @antonioguterres sends best wishes to 1st contingent of peacekeepers from Kazakhstan and all men & women #ServingForPeace. https://t.co/8xKUypYxAC

#LGBTI RIGHTS = HUMAN RIGHTS

Join @free_equal & support fair treatment of lesbian, gay, bi, trans & intersex people everywhere: https://t.co/Ljui9GqDYQ #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/VPSSBkNDnn
Thursday: China takes on rotating presidency of the Security Council for the month of November. Follow @Chinamission2un for updates. https://t.co/amTrLa1WHu https://t.co/zipBevaCzP
Ceremony in Juba, South Sudan celebrates signing of revitalized peace agreement & progress towards durable peace in world's youngest country: https://t.co/ylXYqEPbdc https://t.co/pnAezEUBA6

Children in the poorest 20% of the populations are up to 3 times more likely to die before their 5th birthday than children in the richest countries. Find out how the #GlobalGoals aim to reduce inequalities: https://t.co/vtbxXCjn7i https://t.co/OriFIIAl6L

.@antonioguterres announces appointment of @GeirOPedersen of Norway as Special Envoy for Syria, reiterating gratitude to predecessor Staffan de Mistura for his contributions to search for peace. https://t.co/lB9834IDcC https://t.co/q2vUWFOC9J

Speaking in NYC at an inter-faith tribute to honour victims of Saturday’s mass-shooting in Pittsburgh, @antonioguterres stressed the importance of leaders uniting & standing up for common humanity. https://t.co/6wp9EwX4lW https://t.co/mLHumZ8JP2

What #ClimateAction can cities take to make sure they don't run out of water? 

On Wednesday's World #CitiesDay, hear from the mayor of Cape Town about what she learned from the city's recent water crisis. https://t.co/6Q00r1lt5M
Starting now: #UNGA meeting on the necessity of ending the embargo imposed by the USA against Cuba. Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmUzNN
Thanks to tents provided by @refugees, survivors of the devastating earthquake in Indonesia now are sheltered from the rain. Read their stories: https://t.co/dXaxtxwS3r

Better City. 🌃 
Better Life. 👍

Cities need support to become resilient. Find out more on Wednesday's World #CitiesDay: https://t.co/1iao2GXAGl https://t.co/fZg0T5pdtd

Join us in welcoming this year's Palestinian journalist trainees class who arrived at UNHQ in NYC this week. Find out more about the #PalJournos programme: https://t.co/rqWE1bmdoA https://t.co/EJG7yQbhwp
UN Security Council urges greater protection for humanitarian responders & hospitals in Democratic Republic of Congo amid a worsening Ebola outbreak: https://t.co/iMESCr769I https://t.co/Vn6vrJb8mg

By 2050, 70% of the global population will live in cities. 

Wednesday's World #CitiesDay aims to raise awareness about the importance of building sustainable & resilient cities to achieve the #GlobalGoals. More: https://t.co/1iao2Hfc4V https://t.co/Q1y7xlzS5d

Many intersex kids are forced into medically unnecessary surgeries & treatments that cause physical, psychological and emotional pain & violate their rights. https://t.co/CtxMblT8eD #StandUp4HumanRights via @free_equal https://t.co/hkDYyqDnl8

❗️Tiger population reduced by >95%
❗️Rhinos disappeared from several Asian & African countries

Join @Neymarjr & Thu Minh and go #WildForLife to help bring species back from the brink. Details from @UNEnvironment: https://t.co/yZSMHSJVhi https://t.co/3lABiT7qgG

#TourTuesday: The UN emblem - pictured here on rostrum in #UNGA Hall at UNHQ in NYC - depicts a top-down view of the globe with two olive branches symbolizing peace: https://t.co/2sEsMFgqX7 https://t.co/S6FeZ5QBnQ

9 out of 10 people breathe air containing high levels of pollutants. 

@WHO conference on air pollution & health will seek solutions, including
➡️ renewable energy
➡️ sustainable transport
➡️ waste management
Details: https://t.co/RhC7jV3jHN #BreatheLife https://t.co/M9kgbhMFZY

➡️ Wear long sleeves & pants 🧥👖
➡️ Use insect repellent 🦗
➡️ Put screens on windows & doors 🏠 

See more ways to protect yourself from dangerous mosquito-borne illnesses: https://t.co/sGoZSk1G2P via @PAHOCaribbean https://t.co/YKnTO7DVPg

Every minute, 40 football fields of tropical cover were destroyed worldwide in 2017. But indigenous environmentalists in the Amazon are taking #ClimateAction to stop illegal destruction of the "lungs of the Earth": https://t.co/oXU3YMv9li via @UNDP

Air pollution can stunt brain development and trigger asthma & cancer in children.

A new @WHO report prescribes clean air to save lives 👉 https://t.co/LcCmFdQylH #BreatheLife https://t.co/K4fPOzgCbS

The humanitarian crisis in Yemen is rapidly deteriorating. 

@Refugees cash assistance is a life-line for many families who are running out of food, water & medicines. Details: https://t.co/bzcczudhjo
Continue this week @UNGeneva: Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women, 71st session (through 9 Nov): https://t.co/8zaVPIz0YT #CEDAW https://t.co/E5J3uxwc5j

Starts on Tuesday @UNGeneva: 1st @WHO Conference on Pollution and Health to address one of the world’s most significant causes of premature death. Info & Documents here ➡️  https://t.co/AOyZfYJnAG #BreatheLife https://t.co/JUOi4Ucb06
Concludes this week @UNGeneva: Human Rights Committee, 124th session. Country reports & more here: https://t.co/pC012Ql3lU   #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/Vax0x1bXzC
#TruthNeverDies. New @UNESCO  campaign aims to aims to create a free & safe environment for journalists: https://t.co/T1PXdfibYD https://t.co/giJ4D7K5mf

What's happening this week at the UN? World #CitiesDay, #TruthNeverDies on Int'l Day to #EndImpunity for Crimes against Journalists & much more. List of events is here: https://t.co/pblUAAkKMH https://t.co/kyoAZk2m0m

Good #ClimateAction news: Air quality regulations & anti-pollution measures in Europe & North America have had very positive impacts on air quality: https://t.co/blYXzQmaJa #BreatheLife via @WMO https://t.co/qyvupGdHsD

Racism, xenophobia, intolerance... These problems exist in all societies. But they stop with you and me. Every day, each and every one of us can stand up against racial prejudice and intolerant attitudes. See how: https://t.co/SWzARZPfow #FightRacism https://t.co/VJ42JAZeob

.@UNHumanRights expert: Security Council should ensure women take greater part in peacebuilding processes to prevent human trafficking & tackle exploitation. https://t.co/TqEV8rqJd8 #UNSCR1325 https://t.co/SKX1WoWE0H

Education is not a privilege - it's a fundamental human right. #StandUp4HumanRights and join @UNESCO in supporting the #RightToEducation for all: https://t.co/VQEmqyGIPL https://t.co/mrufDGCIRM
New @FAO photo contest gives you a chance to show why #MountainsMatter. Submit your mountain photos here ➡️ https://t.co/T3u9xhL2fT https://t.co/cuqa1ZIXLy

One month after a devastating earthquake & tsunami, Indonesians are still picking up the pieces of their lives. See how @UNOCHA is helping them with health, shelter and other needs: https://t.co/Wb2S00ZKAw https://t.co/ho9J0FahwE

At Monday's #SAMOAPathway dialogue, island nations will determine the next generation of genuine & durable partnerships to achieve the #GlobalGoals. More: https://t.co/QtRFy1pTb9 https://t.co/QPBndH0jWB

Despite rapidly deteriorating humanitarian crisis in Yemen, @refugees is assisting families in hard to reach areas. https://t.co/pyM8A37DKE

Racism, xenophobia, anti-Semitism and intolerance are problems prevalent in all societies. But every day, each and every one of us can stand up against intolerant attitudes. #FightRacism and stand up for someone’s rights today: https://t.co/siDRqxkzEm https://t.co/HkO3Y2uee5
Each year, journalists are killed to be silenced. @UNESCO's #TruthNeverDies campaign aims to aims to create a free & safe environment for journalists: https://t.co/T1PXdfibYD https://t.co/6H25nHOXYm

1 world - 7.5 billion unique faces.

Diversity is a strength, not a threat.

@Refugees is informing members of the "caravan" about their rights: https://t.co/1ATNygHqsi #WithRefugees https://t.co/0TVls0lFfv

At 73 years old, the UN continues to make a difference in the lives of everyone, everywhere. Find out  how Wednesday's #UNDay was celebrated around the 🌎 in our latest @Instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/M94gLsxofh

#ServingForPeace 
working for

"On United Nations Day, let us reaffirm our commitment.
➡️ To repair broken trust.
➡️ To heal our planet.
➡️ To leave no one behind.
➡️ To uphold dignity for one and all, as united nations."
-- @antonioguterres on #UNDay https://t.co/qtpSCY6Wd2 https://t.co/8oveF081KM

3 things YOU can do to address climate change today: 
➡️ Reduce, reuse & recycle your waste ♻️ 
➡️ Switch to reusable water bottles & cutlery 🍴
➡️ Walk, bike or use public transport instead of a car 🚲 
Get more #ClimateAction ideas here 👉 https://t.co/fXksYA7O1x https://t.co/ncirfkjdNc
